LanguageData.BerserkTrance.label: berserk trance
LanguageData.BerserkTrance.description: Driven by fierce moral certainty and stories of ideoligious grievance, this person has driven him or herself into a rage. Every muscle is at peak performance, but it's hard to shut down the anger.
LanguageData.CombatCommand.label: combat command
LanguageData.CombatCommand.description: By encouraging and commanding nearby allies, this person can enhance their focus in combat and thus their battle performance.
LanguageData.CombatCommandBuff.label: combat command
LanguageData.CombatCommandBuff.description: Combat abilities are boosted thanks to being near someone who is using the combat command ability.
LanguageData.FarmingCommand.label: farming command
LanguageData.FarmingCommand.description: This person is offering guidance on farming techniques, boosting the farming abilities for everyone nearby.
LanguageData.FarmingCommandBuff.label: farming command
LanguageData.FarmingCommandBuff.description: This person's farming abilities are boosted thanks to being near someone who is using the farming command ability.
LanguageData.ImmunityDrive.label: immunity drive
LanguageData.ImmunityDrive.description: This person has received moral support of an ideoligious nature. Their mental certainty has energized their body and boosted their immune system.
LanguageData.MarksmanCommand.label: marksman command
LanguageData.MarksmanCommand.description: This person is using a special ability to call out shots. Everyone within an effect radius gains shooting bonuses.
LanguageData.MarksmanCommandBuff.label: marksman command
LanguageData.MarksmanCommandBuff.description: Someone is using the marksman command ability nearby, boosting this person's shooting abilities.
LanguageData.MiningCommand.label: mining command
LanguageData.MiningCommand.description: This person is offering guidance on mining techniques, boosting the mining speed for everyone nearby.
LanguageData.MiningCommandBuff.label: mining command
LanguageData.MiningCommandBuff.description: This person's mining speed is boosted thanks to being near someone who is using the mining command ability.
LanguageData.PreachHealth.label: preach health
LanguageData.PreachHealth.description: This person's will to survive was reinforced by a talk with a moral guide of their ideoligion. That moral certainty has improved their healing and immunization gain rates.
LanguageData.ProductionCommand.label: production command
LanguageData.ProductionCommand.description: This person is offering guidance on construction techniques, boosting construction and crafting abilities for everyone nearby.
LanguageData.ProductionCommandBuff.label: production command
LanguageData.ProductionCommandBuff.description: This person's construction and crafting speeds are boosted thanks to being near someone who is using the production command ability.
LanguageData.ResearchCommand.label: research command
LanguageData.ResearchCommand.description: This person is using a special ability to provide suggestions and mental support, boosting the research speed of everyone nearby.
LanguageData.ResearchCommandBuff.label: research command
LanguageData.ResearchCommandBuff.description: This person's research speed is boosted because they are near someone who is using the research command ability.
LanguageData.WorkDrive.label: work drive
LanguageData.WorkDrive.description: The sense of being called upon by a leader to work harder.
